review: Did not work on my 9 year old Samsung DLP so I had to plug it in to another TV and set it up and adjust the resolution to 720p and then put it back into my Samsung. So now it works. Don't rely on Amazon for any customer support.
author: Jermaine

review: I love it. It's great! Work wonderfully on my HD projecto. A man cave bonus! Movies, TV, Music,App games and more
author: eric rivera

review: Works fine,had older Westinghouse led hdtv,had troubling setting it up. But went on line and was able to use their advice to get it going,the  remote app.works great.
author: John Andrysiak

review: Really liked it. I love the interface, it has good speed. Easy to use. Great price. I just bought a Roku stick, ONLY because it has a Windows Phone app, and the Fire Stick doesn't. I gave it away and bought a fire stick less than a month later. Couldn't be happier with the switch, even though the fire stick doesn't have a WP app.
author: lion_thirteen

review: Love it.  Best purchase we ever made.
author: Wendy M Schiller

review: really love my fire stick....so easy to use.
author: Donna Reason

review: I am very pleased with it.  It allows me to watch Amazon streaming on a tv that is not a smart one :)
author: Gayle Sorg
